body.name: PERLESMITH UL Listed Full Motion TV Wall Mount for Most 26-60 inch Flat Curved OLED 4K TVs up to 77lbs, Wall Mount TV Bracket with Swivel & Extension Arm, Tilt, Leveling, Max VESA 400x400mm, PSMFK12

features: UNIVERSAL TV WALL MOUNT: This swivel TV mount bracket fits most 26-60 inch LED, LCD, OLED 4K TVs and monitors up to 77lbs. Compatible with multiple VESA patterns including 400x400mm, 400x200mm, 300x300mm, 300x200mm, 200x200mm, 200x100mm, 100x200mm, and 100x100mm. Please verify VESA pattern of TV before purchase.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR VIEWING EXPERIENCE: The articulating TV wall mount allows +5° and -15° tilt to reduce glare, 90° swivel (maximum swivel angle depends on your TV) to position your TV exactly where you want it, and 1.77" to 18.89" arm extension for flexible movement and adjustment.

UL listed TV MOUNT: Check UL file number (E522707) to check our sturdy and strong arm, wider wall plate for better supporting the weight, extra longer and stronger articulating arm holds your TV steady and securely even when fully extended. Active joints are welded to the arm and rotary rivet structure to ensure security and stability.

EASY INSTALLATION: The TV wall bracket includes step-by-step instructions and standard mounting hardware for easy installation on single wood stud, concrete, or brick walls. A variety of bolts and spacers are provided to fit most TVs in the listed size range. The +/-3° leveling adjustment allows you to fine-tune your TV’s position after installation.

PERFECT for CORNERS: Thanks to the single-stud design, this full motion TV wall mount is perfect for corner installation where there is limited space for furniture. Install this TV mount in the bedroom, home gym, kitchen, and more. PURCHASE WITH CONFIDENCE: Please contact our US-based product support team if you have any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PERLESMITH Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26″-60″ TVs

PERLESMITH TV Wall Mount - Best Value In Home Comfort！ Why choose PERLESMITH Wall Mount TV Bracket？ PERLESMITH has been dedicated to produce TV wall mount for many years, and we have a professional team of experts in this area. Our TV wall mount not only gives you attractive & stylish look, butt also meets your needs.

You can mount it everywhere ! It’s flexible and it’s suitable to mount a TV in a corner. Since you can use it to mount your TV in a corner, it helps you save a lot of space. With it, you can swivel your TV and also tilt it. You can move your TV in different directions.

Multiple TV Mount Brackets Choice Provided ! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well. Not slim.
reviews.reviewText: The PSMFK12 mount had all the hardware I needed. It is 2.5inch thick, not slim. I used a drill and bits, a level, measuring tape, phillips screwdriver, and a magnet gizmo to find the sheetrock screws (to find the stud). I did not find a paper template to mark the holes to drill. Could have save some time. I used a cardboard mockup of my 43inch TV, and masking tape to see how it would look like. I did like that it was easy to 'hang' the TV on the bolt of the bracket (practice before to understand how the bracket interlocks with the back plate on the TV). My 43 inch TV was only 18 lbs and the mount felt solid. They say 77 lbs max but I feel like 45-50 lbs is a more realistic maximum. It rotates well, and changing the incline was easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought to mount a TV in a spare bedroom that needed to swing out over a dresser, Worked perfectly, just measure your mounting holes in the back of your tv and bolt the TV bracket together where the instructions for that measurement show. Figure out where on the wall you want it, drill your first hole, mount the wall bracket with one screw, level it (it comes with a small level), Drill and screw the other 2 holes, Easy, comes with many mounting options for sheetrock/wood/ etc and all the hardware, Simple to read instructions with diagrams, Heavy metal and very sturdy, fully extended out and turned the tv is solid,, very happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the stuff you need included
reviews.reviewText: this is a simple to install bracket that I mounted a 50 inch Vizio with it has good adjustability and is very sturdy for the newer lightweight tvs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price, but lacks ability to securely lock in level
reviews.reviewText: TV mount provides great range of motion, adjustable pitch (to modify the viewing angle), and with decent quality fasteners (some items from China have crumbly bolts which break apart and strip very easily). The instructions could be a little clearer to read, but that was minor. My only complaint is the way the TV face plate mounts to the wall bracket, using two overlapping circles, you can see the circles in the first picture of the product. The challenge with this design is that the plate mount and bracket never "stick" in one position (it's constantly rotating along the circle), so every time you move the TV, the TV gets out of level. It's not extreme, but it does throw the TV level off a few degrees each time you move the TV, which is annoying. I've loosened, releveled, and tightened the TV 3 times now, yet it keeps unleveling itself. (The wall mount bracket is flush level, so that isn't the issue.) Will need to enlist a friends help to hold the TV level while tightening the two level bolts as much as possible. (I ratcheted as tightly as I could without stripping the bolt heads, but maybe need to go even tighter.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install and not expensive at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better the described
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to mount on wood stud . The oly thing I CHANGED was the drill size Instruction says use a 5/32 drill bit for wood studs . I did a test on a scrap 2x4 and drilled it with the 5/32 and it was to small for the screw . I went with a 3/16 bit . But do a test on a scrap wood .the hardware was great looks strong and well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This mount is very easy to install. I especially like the fact that the entire mount attaches to a single stud. This can be used anywhere and it can be turned and pulled out for watching wherever you are. The mount moves easily without much effort. This is very sturdy. My 50 inch tv fit perfectly on the mount without adding any extra arms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full range of motion, Well made
reviews.reviewText: You can trust this well made mount to hold your TV. You can move your TV to any position: tilt up and down, right or left; extend forward or close to wall. Would buy this one again.
